pkgmetadata.longdescription: Large Language Model (LLM) Tools for Psychological Text Analysis // A collection of large language model (LLM) text analysis methods designed with psychological data in mind. Currently, LLMing (aka "lemming") includes a text anomaly detection method based on the angle-based subspace approach described by Zhang, Lin, and Karim (2015) doi:10.1016/j.ress.2015.05.025.
